'''A collection of items.'''

    '''The items.'''

    def __init__(self):

        '''
        Not sure what to do for "St.". This --> [' St', ' St.'] would also
        pick up something such as 123 Straight Road. The same could
        conceivably happen with "Ave". "Dr" needs to become "Drive", but have
        the same problem
        '''
